Html:
Hi,

I am binding the WPF datagrid to some rather big data. The grid after binding becomes very slow to respond to. Is there any thing like datagrid virtualization, etc. in WPF Toolkit and what can be the other ways to make the performance of my grid better.

Thanks in advance.

Regards,
How large is your data set, how many columns, and do you have EnableColumnVirtualization and EnableRowVirtualization set to true?
My data set is of variable size both in terms of number of rows and columns. I have tired with row virtualization but the end result is still slow.
I can't really recommend anything without some kind of information.  How many rows and columns before it is slow?  You've tried row virtualization but have you also tried column virtualization?

Yes, I have tried it with both the Row and the Column virtualization set. It performs a bit better but still has a lag when some1 scrolls.

Regards,
